Posts.Content: The statistics is based on if you are following the traditional treatments such as surgery, chemotherapy, and radiation. Change your lifestyle, improve your diet, take some proven natural remedies, do some good exercises.....all these will help increase your chance of survival. Your body definitely has the ability to heal itself. Quote: Originally Posted by sophie56 My doctor said I only had a 50% chance of living for five years. It was just a very unexpected statement. Do all of you feel this is the case? Thank-you, Sophie 56
Posts.Title: Death from stage III cancer
